##Now, the fun XGBoost stuff

```{r}
designMatrix <-
  train_dockets %>% select(nmotionsfiled, pro_se, rateSettle, issue_joined, motionsDenied, motionsGranted) %>%
  # mutate(
  #   nos_code = as_factor(nos_code)) %>%
  as.data.table() %>% one_hot() %>% as.matrix() 

labelSettled <- train_dockets %>% select(settled) %>% mutate(settled = ifelse(settled == TRUE, 1, 0)) %>% as.matrix()

set.seed(2020)
n <- 100
data <- data.frame(x=runif(n), y=rnorm(n))
ind <- sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(0.5, 0.5))
dataTrainSettled <- designMatrix[ind, ]
dataTestSettled <- designMatrix[!ind, ]
labelTrainSettled <- labelSettled[ind,]
labelTestSettled <- labelSettled[!ind,]

trainDataSettled <- xgb.DMatrix(dataTrainSettled, label = labelTrainSettled)
testDataSettled <- xgb.DMatrix(dataTestSettled, label = labelTestSettled)
bstSettled <- xgboost(data = trainDataSettled, eta = 0.2, nthread = 2, nrounds = 20, objective = "binary:logistic")
predSettled <- predict(bstSettled, trainDataSettled)
outcomeSettled <- ifelse(predSettled > 0.5, 1, 0)
mean(outcomeSettled == labelTrainSettled)

importance_matrix <- xgb.importance(model = bstSettled)
print(importance_matrix)
xgb.plot.importance(importance_matrix = importance_matrix)

labelSummJudg <- train_dockets %>% select(summary_judgment) %>% mutate(summary_judgment = ifelse(summary_judgment == TRUE, 1, 0)) %>% as.matrix()

set.seed(2020)
n <- 100
data <- data.frame(x=runif(n), y=rnorm(n))
ind <- sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), n, replace=TRUE, prob=c(0.5, 0.5))
dataTrainSummJudg <- designMatrix[ind, ]
dataTestSummJudg <- designMatrix[!ind, ]
labelTrainSummJudg <- labelSummJudg[ind,]
labelTestSummJudg <- labelSummJudg[!ind,]

trainDataSummJudg <- xgb.DMatrix(dataTrainSummJudg, label = labelTrainSummJudg)
testDataSummJudg <- xgb.DMatrix(dataTestSummJudg, label = labelTestSummJudg)
bstSummJudg <- xgboost(data = trainDataSummJudg, eta = 0.2, nthread = 2, nrounds = 20, objective = "binary:logistic")
predSummJudg <- predict(bstSummJudg, trainDataSummJudg)
outcomeSummJudg <- ifelse(predSummJudg > 0.5, 1, 0)
mean(outcomeSummJudg == labelTrainSummJudg)

importance_matrix <- xgb.importance(model = bstSummJudg)
print(importance_matrix)
xgb.plot.importance(importance_matrix = importance_matrix)

```
